Name: Triomphe d'Anis (Triumph of Aniseed)
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and star anise.
RINSE glass with absinthe, discard excess and set to one side.
Separately, STIR other ingredients with ice in mixing glass.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Garnish with star anise floated on surface.
Review: A boozy stirred sipper, perhaps an after-dinner brandy-based cocktail, with hints of anise coffee and dry sherry complexity.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Isaac Windsor at The Milk Thistle in Bristol, England.
